# vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ vmnet ](/documentation/vmnet)

- [ vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:) ](/documentation/vmnet/vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:))

-  vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:) 

Function# vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:)

Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 26.0+

```
func vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(
    _ config: vmnet_network_configuration_ref,
    _ client: UnsafePointer<ether_addr_t>,
    _ reservation: UnsafePointer<in_addr>
) -> vmnet_return_t
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/vmnet/vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:)#parameters)

`config`The network configuration object to be modified.

`client`The mac address for which the DHCP address is reserved.

`reservation`The DHCP address to be reserved.

## [Return Value](/documentation/vmnet/vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:)#return-value)

VMNET_SUCCESS on success, error otherwise.

## [Discussion](/documentation/vmnet/vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:)#discussion)

Configures a new dhcp reservation for a vmnet network.

Reserve a DHCP address for a client with certain MAC address. Note that modifying reservation is not allowed while a network is active.
title: vmnet_network_configuration_add_dhcp_reservation(_:_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation
